title: 13.75 Perches Land with a old big house - 200 M to Pannipitiya (This can be divided in to 6 perches Land area and 7.75 perches land with house)
details:
13.75 Perches Land with a old big house - 200 M to Pannipitiya

This land can be divided in to 2 plots if customer is searching small land area.

This can be divided in to 6 perches Land area and 7.75 perches land with a house.
